name: Audio Output
description: This cluster provides an interface for controlling the Output on a Video Player device such as a TV. This cluster would be supported on a device with audio outputs like a Video Player device (Smart TV, TV Setup Top Box, Smart Speaker, etc). This cluster provides the list of available outputs and provides commands for selecting and renaming them.

OutputTypeEnum.description: The type of output, expressed as an enum, with the following values:

OutputInfoStruct.description: This contains information about an output.

0x0000.name: OutputList
0x0000.description: This attribute provides the list of outputs supported by the device.

0x0001.name: CurrentOutput
0x0001.description: This attribute contains the value of the index field of the currently selected OutputInfoStruct.

0x00.name: SelectOutput
0x00.description: Upon receipt, this SHALL change the output on the device to the output at a specific index in the Output List.

0x01.name: RenameOutput
0x01.description: Upon receipt, this SHALL rename the output at a specific index in the Output List.
